infoAlert.title: Why is this important?
infoAlert.description: Without your own domain, your emails will be sent from a foreign address, which often ends up in the spam folder. With your own domain, you increase the delivery rate by up to 95%.

emptyState.message: You haven't added any domains yet.
emptyState.hint: Don't worry, we'll guide you step by step through the process.
